text: We will now move onto our next topic today. Recently we have conducted a survey on happiness. The survey has large samples from regions, countries, and even worldwide. One factor that makes people happy is the consistent patterns and they are prevalent and consistent across countries and borders. Consistent patterns include some basic things like income, marital status, and employment status. Lastly, other critical factors include that make people happy include environment, quality of life, and natural instinct.
